53 EndEffectorInterfaceCore::EndEffectorInterfaceCore(ros::NodeHandle &nh, std::shared_ptr<ttl_driver::TtlInterfaceCore> ttl_interface) : _ttl_interface(std::move(ttl_interface))
54 {
55  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::ctor");
56 
57  init(nh);
58 }
59 
65 bool EndEffectorInterfaceCore::init(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
66 {
67  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::init - Initializing parameters...");
68  initParameters(nh);
69 
70  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initEndEffectorHardware...");
71  initEndEffectorHardware();
72 
73  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::init - Starting services...");
74  startServices(nh);
75 
76  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::init - Starting publishers...");
77  startPublishers(nh);
78 
79  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::init - Starting subscribers...");
80  startSubscribers(nh);
81 
82  return true;
83 }
84 
89 bool EndEffectorInterfaceCore::rebootHardware()
90 {
91  // reboot
92  bool res = _ttl_interface->rebootHardware(_end_effector_state);
93 
94  // re init
95  if (res)
96  initHardware();
97 
98  return res;
99 }
100 
105 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initParameters(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
106 {
107  int id = -1;
108  nh.getParam("end_effector_id", id);
109  _id = static_cast<uint8_t>(id);
110 
111  nh.getParam("/niryo_robot/simulation_mode", _simulation);
112 
113  double check_end_effector_status_frequency{1.0};
114  nh.getParam("check_end_effector_status_frequency", check_end_effector_status_frequency);
115  assert(check_end_effector_status_frequency);
116 
117  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initParameters - end effector id : %d", _id);
118  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initParameters - end effector status frequency : %f", check_end_effector_status_frequency);
119 
120  // init ros duration according to given frequency
121  _states_publisher_duration = ros::Duration(1.0 / check_end_effector_status_frequency);
122 
123  std::string hw_type;
124  int collision_thresh;
125  nh.getParam("hardware_type", hw_type);
126  nh.getParam("collision_thresh", collision_thresh);
127  auto ee_type = common::model::HardwareTypeEnum(hw_type.c_str());
128 
129  // initiliaze end effector state
130  _end_effector_state = std::make_shared<EndEffectorState>(_id, ee_type);
131 
132  _end_effector_state->setCollisionThresh(collision_thresh);
133 
134  if (nh.hasParam("collision_thresh_algo_2"))
135  {
136  int collision_thresh_algo2; // used
137  nh.getParam("collision_thresh_algo_2", collision_thresh_algo2);
138  _end_effector_state->setCollisionThreshAlgo2(collision_thresh_algo2);
139  }
140 
141  uint8_t button_id = 0;
142  while (nh.hasParam("button_" + std::to_string(button_id) + "/type"))
143  {
144  std::string button_type;
145  nh.getParam("button_" + std::to_string(button_id) + "/type", button_type);
146  auto eType = ButtonTypeEnum(button_type.c_str());
147 
148  ROS_INFO("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initParameters : configure button %d of type %s", button_id, eType.toString().c_str());
149  _end_effector_state->configureButton(button_id, eType);
150  button_id++;
151  }
152 }
153 
158 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::startServices(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
159 {
160  _digital_in_server = nh.advertiseService("set_ee_io_state", &EndEffectorInterfaceCore::_callbackSetIOState, this);
161 }
162 
167 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::startPublishers(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
168 {
169  _free_drive_button_state_publisher = nh.advertise<end_effector_interface::EEButtonStatus>("free_drive_button_status", 10, true);
170 
171  _save_pos_button_state_publisher = nh.advertise<end_effector_interface::EEButtonStatus>("save_pos_button_status", 10, true);
172 
173  _custom_button_state_publisher = nh.advertise<end_effector_interface::EEButtonStatus>("custom_button_status", 10, true);
174 
175  _digital_out_publisher = nh.advertise<end_effector_interface::EEIOState>("io_state", 10, true);
176 
177  _states_publisher_timer = nh.createTimer(_states_publisher_duration, &EndEffectorInterfaceCore::_publishButtonState, this);
178 }
179 
184 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::startSubscribers(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
185 {
186  (void)nh; // unused
187 
188  ROS_DEBUG("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::startSubscribers - no subscribers to start");
189 }
190 
194 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initEndEffectorHardware()
195 {
196  // init driver
197  if (_end_effector_state && _end_effector_state->isValid())
198  {
199  int result = _ttl_interface->setEndEffector(_end_effector_state);
200 
201  if (niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == result && niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS == initHardware())
202  {
203  ROS_INFO("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::ctor - Set end effector success");
204  }
205  else
206  {
207  _end_effector_state->setConnectionStatus(false);
208  ROS_WARN("EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initEndEffectorHardware - "
209  "Set end effector failure, return : %d. Aborted...",
210  result);
211  }
212  }
213 }
214 
218 int EndEffectorInterfaceCore::initHardware()
219 {
220  if (_end_effector_state)
221  {
222  uint32_t thresh = _end_effector_state->getCollisionThresh();
223 
224  if (_end_effector_state->getHardwareType() == EHardwareType::NED3PRO_END_EFFECTOR)
225  {
226  uint32_t thresh_algo_2 = _end_effector_state->getCollisionThreshAlgo2();
227 
228  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
229  std::make_unique<EndEffectorSingleCmd>(
230  EEndEffectorCommandType::CMD_TYPE_SET_COLLISION_THRESH_ALGO_2, _end_effector_state->getId(), std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{thresh_algo_2}));
231  }
232  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
233  std::make_unique<EndEffectorSingleCmd>(EEndEffectorCommandType::CMD_TYPE_SET_COLLISION_THRESH, _end_effector_state->getId(), std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{thresh}));
234  }
235  return niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS;
236 }
237 
242 void EndEffectorInterfaceCore::_publishButtonState(const ros::TimerEvent &)
243 {
244  EEButtonStatus button_msg;
245  EEIOState io_msg;
246 
247  if (_end_effector_state)
248  {
249  if (!_simulation)
250  {
251  for (const auto &button : _end_effector_state->getButtonsStatus())
252  {
253  if (button->actions.empty())
254  continue;
255 
256  button_msg.action = static_cast<uint8_t>(button->actions.front());
257  switch (button->type)
258  {
259  case EButtonType::FREE_DRIVE_BUTTON:
260  _free_drive_button_state_publisher.publish(button_msg);
261  break;
262  case EButtonType::SAVE_POSITION_BUTTON:
263  _save_pos_button_state_publisher.publish(button_msg);
264  break;
265  case EButtonType::CUSTOM_BUTTON:
266  _custom_button_state_publisher.publish(button_msg);
267  break;
268  default:
269  break;
270  }
271  button->actions.pop();
272  }
273  }
274 
275  // digital io state
276  io_msg.digital_input = _end_effector_state->getDigitalIn();
277  io_msg.digital_output = _end_effector_state->getDigitalOut();
278  _digital_out_publisher.publish(io_msg);
279  }
280 }
281 
288 bool EndEffectorInterfaceCore::_callbackSetIOState(end_effector_interface::SetEEDigitalOut::Request &req, end_effector_interface::SetEEDigitalOut::Response &res)
289 {
290  res.state = false;
291 
292  if (_end_effector_state && _end_effector_state->isValid())
293  {
294  _ttl_interface->addSingleCommandToQueue(
295  std::make_unique<EndEffectorSingleCmd>(EEndEffectorCommandType::CMD_TYPE_DIGITAL_OUTPUT, _end_effector_state->getId(), std::initializer_list<uint32_t>{req.data}));
296  _end_effector_state->setDigitalOut(req.data);
297  // TODO(cc) find a way to check if ok
298  res.state = true;
299  }
300 
301  return res.state;
302 }
